KScriptSetting.Name: TextRepository
KScriptSetting.Description: The repository that contains Text Objects such as Layout and View
KScriptSetting.Example:
<script engine="kscript">

      var view = k.site.views.get("viewname");
      
      var layout = k.site.layouts.get("layoutname"); 
      
     //For site object that use name as the key like view & layout, you may also use syntax below:  
     var view = k.site.views.viewname;   
     view.body = "newtext";  
     k.site.views.viewname = view; 

    </script>

Method.Name: all
Method.Description: Return an array of the SiteObjects

Method.Name: updateBody
Method.Description: Update the text value of the body property
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">

     var view = k.site.views.viewname;   
     view.body = "newtext";  
     k.site.views.viewname = view; 
     
     // or 
     
      var view = k.site.views.get("viewname");
      k.site.views.updateBody(view.name, "new page body");
    
    </script>

Method.Name: get
Method.Description: Get an item based on Name or Id
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
    
    var view = k.site.views.viewname; 
    
     // or     
    
    var view = k.site.views.get("viewname"); 
  
</script>

Method.Name: update
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
     
    var view = k.site.views.get("viewname"); 
    view.body = "new body"; 
    k.site.views.update(view);   
    
</script>

Method.Name: add
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
  var view = {};
  view.name = "newview";
  view.body = "new view body";
  k.site.views.add(view);
</script>
